channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: Astera Labs 及其投资者将在英特尔支持的人工智能基础设施公司的首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集约 7.13 亿美元，定价高于区间。
item.description:
Astera Labs and its investors are set to raise about $713 million in an IPO for the Intel-backed AI infrastructure company that priced above range. https://t.co/9YI2JAy9Vk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 日元兑欧元跌至 2008 年以来的最弱水平，原因是人们猜测日本央行在结束全球最后一次负利率政策后仍将保持宽松的货币政策
item.description:
The yen falls to the weakest level since 2008 against the euro on speculation the Bank of Japan will keep its monetary policy accommodative even after it ended the world’s last negative-interest-rate policy https://t.co/U3LEmDYTqc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据美联社报道，俄亥俄州商人伯尼-莫雷诺赢得了该州共和党美国参议院初选，在特朗普的支持和民粹主义的呼吁下，他战胜了传统的共和党建制派
item.description:
Bernie Moreno, an Ohio businessman, won the state’s Republican US Senate primary, according to the Associated Press, prevailing over the traditionalist GOP establishment with Trump’s backing and a populist appeal https://t.co/dvyfmSkrT9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 包括恒大在内的中国陷入困境的房地产开发商下一步将何去何从？专家们在彭博中国信贷论坛上为投资者分析了风险和机遇。请关注我们的博客直播，了解最新进展。
item.description:
What's next for China's distressed property developers, including Evergrande? Experts weigh in on the risks and opportunities for investors at Bloomberg's China Credit Forum. Follow our live blog for updates. https://t.co/V2tjLeJxHR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德说，美国检察官提议将他投入长达 50 年的监狱，这 "歪曲了现实"，并将他描绘成一个 "堕落的超级恶棍"。
item.description:
Sam Bankman-Fried said US prosecutors’ proposal to put him in prison for as long as 50 years “distorts reality” and paints him as a “depraved super-villain” https://t.co/cVD09OPjNQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）和西奈山医疗系统（Mount Sinai Health System）同意签订一份新的多年期合同，这将避免成千上万的纽约市民失去网络内医生的服务。
item.description:
UnitedHealth and Mount Sinai Health System agreed to a new multiyear contract that will prevent thousands of New Yorkers from losing access to their in-network doctors https://t.co/Duo8Gtt3zR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: Pimco 认为，日本央行政策转变的潜在规模可能超出一些人的预期，并将重新激发人们对日本债券的兴趣。
item.description:
The potential scale of the Bank of Japan’s policy shift may be more than some are expecting and lead to renewed interest in Japanese bonds, according to Pimco https://t.co/Yq7El6ncM1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国股市在经历数月抛售后触底反弹，投资者正通过收益情况寻找可持续复苏的迹象
item.description:
As Chinese stocks bottom out after months of selling, investors are sifting through earnings for signs of a sustainable recovery https://t.co/vf2m20IfUr

item.title: #5Things：美联储利率决议进入倒计时。股市的亢奋涨势让同一家公司的策略师们感到困惑。日本央行结束负政策利率后日元暴跌。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
#5Things: The countdown to the Federal Reserve’s rate decision begins. The euphoric stock market rally confounds strategists within the same firm. The yen slumps after the Bank of Japan ends its negative policy rate. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/KlXJCEl3ny

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 印度国家基础设施与发展融资银行计划发行高达 48 亿美元的本币债券，这家新成立的印度贷款机构旨在将其贷款发放量提高一倍以上
item.description:
National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development plans to raise up to $4.8 billion in local currency bonds, as the newly created Indian lender aims to more than double its loans disbursement https://t.co/dq4nypVB7O

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美联储周三可能会避免发出即将降息的信号，继续关注顽固的通胀问题，同时关注缓慢上升的失业率
item.description:
The Fed will likely avoid signaling an imminent rate cut Wednesday, staying focused on stubborn inflation while keeping an eye on the slowly rising unemployment rate https://t.co/V2rFhEVZDY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 自由港液化天然气公司首席执行官在接受采访时说，维修工作将于 5 月初结束，之后该公司将增加液化天然气的产量。
item.description:
Freeport LNG will increase its production of liquefied natural gas following repairs that are due to be concluded in early May, the company’s chief executive officer said in an interview. https://t.co/ILh8srQwny

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: Archegos 资本管理公司的 Bill Hwang 说，他从银行获得的信息支持了他在与政府就其投资基金是否操纵其投资组合中的相关证券而展开的争论中的论点。
item.description:
Archegos Capital Management’s Bill Hwang said he received information from banks that bolsters his arguments in a fight with the government over whether his investment fund manipulated the underlying securities in its portfolio https://t.co/5am3AKFz3k

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 摩根大通去年利润创历史新高，将股息提高 9.5%，达到每股 1.15 美元
item.description:
JPMorgan lifted its dividend 9.5% to $1.15 a share after reporting a record profit last year https://t.co/5a92y67dsT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 纳斯达克最大的股东迪拜交易所将出售其在交易所运营商中约三分之一的股份
item.description:
Nasdaq’s biggest shareholder, Borse Dubai, is selling roughly one third of its stake in the exchange operator https://t.co/n9I8rTXyks

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 科威特正在三个炼油厂加紧加工原油，以遵守与欧佩克+达成的自愿石油减产协议
item.description:
Kuwait is cranking up crude processing at its three refineries as the nation complies with voluntary oil production curtailments agreed with OPEC+ https://t.co/qGVbkOjHPW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美联储今天可能按兵不动，市场将重点关注最新的点阵图以及杰罗姆-鲍威尔就何时开始削减开支给出的任何指导意见
item.description:
The Fed may hold today, with markets focused on the updated dot plot and any guidance from Jerome Powell on when cuts will start https://t.co/QT3bzh9RUf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

Commodities prices have more room to rally if the Fed cuts interest rates in coming months, Carlyle’s Jeff Currie says https://t.co/qkuVw9MDLY

item.title: 债券交易商正在加大对国债的空头押注，以应对美联储将调低市场对今年降息预期的风险
item.description:
Bond traders are stepping up short bets against Treasuries, positioning for the risk that the Fed will dial back the market’s expectations for interest-rate cuts this year https://t.co/aR5dL93nkQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.description:
Past halving events have led to a massive rally in Bitcoin. This time could be different, according to @olgakharif https://t.co/xDqFUZiOO1

item.title: 乌拉圭支付金融科技公司 Dlocal 的股价创下了自 2023 年 5 月以来的最差表现，此前该公司的盈利未达预期，并表示较高的支出将对今年的利润率造成压力。
item.description:
Shares of Uruguayan payments fintech Dlocal posted their worst performance since May 2023 after the company missed earnings forecasts and flagged that higher spending would weigh on margins this year. https://t.co/nqqP0NFJEv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: "卡莱尔能源途径首席战略官杰夫-库里（Jeff Currie）在接受彭博电视阿里克斯-斯蒂尔（Alix Steel）采访时说："在经济扩张的晚期做空石油和大宗商品，就像在暴风雪中做空天然气一样。
item.description:
“Being short oil and commodities in a late-cycle expansion is like being short natural gas in a blizzard,” Jeff Currie, Carlyle’s chief strategy officer of energy pathways, says during an interview with Alix Steel on Bloomberg Television https://t.co/PmOIvFWZBq pic.twitter.com/Ciy6nk3MLm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统即将颁布新的尾气排放规定，这是他气候议程中的一项标志性内容，将引发一场关于电动汽车的选举年政治斗争
item.description:
President Joe Biden is about to deliver new rules on tailpipe emissions, a signature piece of his climate agenda, that will inflame an election-year political battle over electric vehicles https://t.co/Uua6I3kScs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024
